column3: Strategic legal counsel for contested and uncontested divorce cases in Lancaster County. We protect your assets and interests, handling complex marital property division and alimony disputes near Penn Square and the Lancaster Court of Common Pleas.
Aggressive advocacy for fair spousal support and APL arrangements. Whether seeking or contesting alimony in Lancaster, PA, we ensure financial disclosures are accurate and your rights protected.

Protect your financial future during divorce. We handle the complex division of marital assets, including retirement accounts, real estate, and business interests, ensuring a fair equitable distribution under Pennsylvania law.

Comprehensive representation for child custody and visitation matters. We fight for your parental rights and the best interests of your child, navigating complex custody schedules and modifications in the Lancaster County family court system.
Ensure fair child support calculations. We represent parents in support conferences and hearings in Lancaster, addressing income deviations, daycare costs, and enforcement actions.
Urgent legal defense for PFA matters. Whether you are filing for protection or defending against false allegations in Lancaster County, we provide rapid, aggressive representation to protect you.
Guiding families through the stepparent adoption process in Lancaster, PA. We handle termination of parental rights and finalize adoptions to legally secure your family unit.
Specialized defense against indicated ChildLine reports in Pennsylvania. We fight to clear your name and reputation through administrative hearings, protecting your career and future.
